title: VlogMonitor
description:
Experience the convenience of filming yourself on your iPhone’s rear camera and seeing yourself on your iPad, all with the VlogMonitor app.

Connect your devices to the same Wi-Fi network, and you’re ready to effortlessly mirror your screen from one device to another.

Unleash the versatility of the VlogMonitor app, empowering you to mirror your screen from your iPhone or iPad to iPhone, iPad, Mac, or Vision Pro. It’s all about vlogging on your terms, on the device you love.
